definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Nerver forget that the lowest bidder made your weapon.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了你手上的武器是由出價最低的承包商製造的。

sentences.english: DCNS will be lead contractor and be responsible for the USV platform and interface with the mother ship.
sentences.chinese: DCNS將領導承包商負責USV與母船平臺和接口。

sentences.english: Contractors have started building on waste land near the town.
sentences.chinese: 承包商在城附近的荒地上開始從事營造業。

sentences.english: The third, M&A between main-system contractors was dominant.
sentences.chinese: 再次，主系統承包商的併購占主導地位。

sentences.english: When it comes to hiring contractors, again I will ask you to wait.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及到僱用承包商的時候，我再次請求你耐心等待。

sentences.english: Apptis is the prime contractor on the project.
sentences.chinese: Apptis則是該項目的主承包商。

sentences.english: All refractory items are to be placed lot wise and any damage done will be to the contractor's responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 所有耐材應批量堆放，如果產生損壞則由承包商負責。

sentences.english: A bipartisan commission, created by Congress last year, is studying contractors closely.
sentences.chinese: 去年由國會創建的一個兩黨委員會正緊盯着承包商。

sentences.english: Typically, defense contractors crank out just a few hundred armored vehicles a year.
sentences.chinese: 通常，國防承包商一年才造幾百輛裝甲車。

sentences.english: e pulled out his level and put it on the scaffold to show that the scaffold was level.
sentences.chinese: 於是承包商拿出水平儀放在腳手架上說明這是水平的。

sentences.english: Contractor shall provide sample work with the submittal of their resume.
sentences.chinese: 承包商應提供樣品，其恢復的提交工作。

sentences.english: This template may be used to report errors to the contractor for further action.
sentences.chinese: 此模板可用於報告錯誤向承包商採取進一步的行動。

sentences.english: The unamused contractor, it is said, refused to bite.
sentences.chinese: 據說那個沒幽默的承包商拒絕咬一口。

sentences.english: Salvador Idal: American and Israeli defense contractors have now developed effective mind-scanning machines.
sentences.chinese: 美國和以色列國防承包商已制訂了有效的心態掃描機。

sentences.english: Managers of the intelligence agencies do not necessarily know how many contractors work for them.
sentences.chinese: 情報機構的管理者不必知道有多少承包商爲他們工作。

sentences.english: The system will be operated by contractor personnel.
sentences.chinese: 該系統將由承包商工作人員操作。

definition: to contract for an entire project
